title: Souls ReAligned
description: A once broken woman, striving to find her former self… A man in love, determined to heal her heart… An infinite universal force. When the one you want, is undeniably the one you need… put aside your fears and believe.Ethan’s persistence nature forces Olivia to examine her feelings and face her fears. He too, faces major obstacles in his life and a troubled past full of secrets. Secrets that could destroy Olivia’s trust in him forever. Eccentric psychic, Eva Storm senses the energy around them. Watching over these disconnected souls, she wills the universe to steer them together. She knows that fate can change and destiny is not always an easy path. Sometimes the journey is full of twists and turns. But love is the only true magic, for only true love transcends all time.
author: Tricia Daniels
